logline: In a dimly lit factory during the early 1920s, three workers find joy and camaraderie amidst their labor, turning a moment of hardship into laughter and play.

background.description: A dimly lit factory floor filled with towering machines and scattered tools.

characters.name: JACK
characters.description: A lanky, optimistic young man with a straw hat, always smiling despite the hard work.
characters.prompt: Lanky young man in a straw hat, smiling, posing dramatically.

characters.name: LUCY
characters.description: A spirited woman with a headscarf, quick-witted, and loves to laugh, with a knack for physical comedy.
characters.prompt: Spirited woman in a headscarf, pretending to push against an invisible wall, comically straining.

characters.name: TED
characters.description: A stout, serious fellow with a mustache, often the straight man in their antics, but secretly enjoys the fun.
characters.prompt: Stout man with a mustache, arms crossed, smirking at the antics of others.

beats.description: The three workers gather in a cleared space among the machines, taking a moment away from their labor.
JACK strikes a dramatic pose, mimicking an invisible wall.
LUCY pretends to push against the wall, her face comically straining.
TED watches with a skeptical expression, making a humorous remark.
JACK mimics unlocking the wall, and LUCY gasps, pretending to push it over.
JACK and LUCY start a playful dance, with TED reluctantly joining in.
They all burst into exaggerated laughter, lifting the heavy factory mood.
